Title: Savage Big Stabbas
Legend: Carrying Gorktoof spears, massive weapons capable of felling a Stardrake, Big Stabbas seek to slay the greatest of beasts. Even should these daring orruks be killed, they will hurl their huge spears to bring down their target in a final act of defiance.
Intro: Each model in a Savage Big Stabbas unit is armed with a Gorktoof.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Teef Rukk • Da Snorter’s Kop Rukk

Rules.Name: Da Final Fling
Rules.Fluff: Should a BigStabba team be slain, they will use their final breath to hurl their Gorktoof at the foe.
Rules.Rule: Each time a model in this unit is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, before the model is removed from play, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of the slain model and roll a dice. Add 2 to the roll if that enemy unit is a MONSTER. On a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
